org.jpws.front

Class MenuHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpws.front.MenuHandler

  • public class MenuHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Static singelton class to handle command menu setup and runtime administration.
    Author:
    Kevin Preece, Wolfgang Keller
